Pronostico para esta tarde-noche: un té rojo y Una Corte de Rosas y Espinas de Sarah J. Maas 🌹📖

Hace dos años empecé a leer este hermosisimo libro, no sabía realmente que esperar de la historia pero terminé adorando TODO. Ahora marcare mis frases y partes favoritas.

summary: I need some reading materials
body:
I need some reading materials

If you’ve got some good (preferably not smut, but an actual story) fan fictions about

  • The shadowhunter chronicles (tmi, tda, tid etc.) (Cassandra Clare)
  • The Iron Fey series (Julie Kagawa)
  • Throne of Glass (Sarah J Maas)
  • Acotar (Sarah J Maas)
  • Or any Joss Stirling book
  • And ofc RR books.

Please sent me the link.

(I didn’t include HP because I wanted to avoid the TONS of drarry recommandations)

tags: a court of thorns and roses
summary: Fuck
body:
Fuck

Recently I recommended A Court Of Thorn and Roses to my friend for her to read anD SHE LITERALLY LOVES TAMLIN- and I hate him so much but I have to pretend to like him for her sake, because spoilers suck thanks. Can she just read ACOMAF already 😔🥂

Just your friendly neighbourhood fandom blog! Current fandoms:

TOG, ACOTAR, The Grishaverse (Leigh Bardugo), MARVEL, GOT, Legend (Marie Lu) and many more!

Literally just a fan of fantasy and Sci-Fi (and YA-novels). Currently reading: Kingdom of Ash (SO. MUCH. PAIN.) & Luck in the Shadows

Thanks for checking by!

summary: Feyre: if I were a Disney character I’d be Belle because I love reading books and I love people for their souls and who they are...
body:
Feyre: if I were a Disney character I’d be Belle because I love reading books and I love people for their souls and who they are on the inside.

Rhys: in that case, Cas would be Tinkerbell.

Feyre: …and why is that?

Rhys: Because he needs attention or he’ll die.

reblog.comment:
Feyre: if I were a Disney character I’d be Belle because I love reading books and I love people for their souls and who they are on the inside.

Feyre: …and why is that?

Rhys: Because he needs attention or he’ll die.

Rhys: Because he needs attention or he’ll die.
trail.content:

Rhys: in that case, Cas would be Tinkerbell.

Feyre: …and why is that?

Rhys: Because he needs attention or he’ll die.

summary: I love how in Heir of Fire the entire series does a complete 360. It went from Celaena tye assassin, kings champion, Princess...
body: I love how in Heir of Fire the entire series does a complete 360. It went from Celaena tye assassin, kings champion, Princess Nehemia, Chaol or Dorian? Rebellion, overthrow evil king, no more magic except Bad Magic in castle, to actually Celaena is actually Aelin, surprise she’s a princess, and also fae, new continent, there’s magic now, Nehemia is dead, look its Rowan

summary:
Kaltain Rompier
5. The Cock Tease, certified stripper, how dare that girl look like that and not want me to sleep with her. Lust...
body:
Kaltain Rompier

5. The Cock Tease, certified stripper, how dare that girl look like that and not want me to sleep with her. Lust is always personified as a lady in red with a dress slit up her thigh. Lust is sinful because it’s power, it’s not asking for attention - it’s demanding it. I’m told she is the worst kind of woman, that looking good is supposed to be some kind of shame on her kin. I’m told not to leave the house in such a short skirt, not with a shirt so low, not with a lace back, not with high heels, not dressed like that. My lipstick can’t be too red, my hair can’t be too mussed, I can’t just “turn someone on like that and then leave them wanting.” I mentioned that instant gratification actually ruins our psyche and was told that being led on was “exhausting.” I said that there was a difference between purposefully tricking someone into liking you and just being attractive or friendly. I was told there’s also a difference between coffee and tea but both result in caffeine. I said, “I’ve been turned on in class by the girls I talk to but I didn’t expect anything from them,” and they said, “It’s different, you’re not a man,” but couldn’t explain where that difference was.

TOG and ACOTAR Ladies Version - ‘Ten Women I Have Been Warned Against Becoming:’

reblog.comment:

summary: — Você assassinou meu amigo — grunhiu a besta. — Assassinou e escalpelou seu cadáver, vendeu-o no mercado e depois disse que ele...
text: — Você assassinou meu amigo — grunhiu a besta. — Assassinou e escalpelou seu cadáver, vendeu-o no mercado e depois disse que ele mereceu; mesmo assim, tem a audácia de questionar minha generosidade? — Tipicamente humano, ele pareceu acrescentar em silêncio.
source: Corte de espinhos e rosas - Sarah J. Maas

summary: I like that the tog books are very straight forward. No unexpected plot twists that make you want to throw the book because they...
body: I like that the tog books are very straight forward. No unexpected plot twists that make you want to throw the book because they were actually totally expected. In the first one it’s like who’s the murdered? It seems like Cain. Surprise! It is Cain! Not a unnecessary plot twist like surprise! Its Nox! Nope its Cain and I like that.

reblog.comment: I like that the tog books are very straight forward. No unexpected plot twists that make you want to throw the book because they were actually totally expected.
